title: unwind: empty block body 15050000
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2022.05.6-alpha-327e7d96
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 18.04

My node's data was out of sync yesterday, and the following error was reported when checking the log. How can I solve it?

`Jul 02 05:11:48 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[16988]: [EROR] [07-02|05:11:48.288] Staged Sync                              err="[14/16 TxLookup] unwind: empty block body 15050000, hash c43d35f6a64f8a64f046c8deb4069572d622dfe7f028f62301b186f08f0e96f2"
Jul 02 05:11:49 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[16988]: [EROR] [07-02|05:11:49.005] Staged Sync                              err="[14/16 TxLookup] unwind: empty block body 15050000, hash c43d35f6a64f8a64f046c8deb4069572d622dfe7f028f62301b186f08f0e96f2"

> 15050000 it's https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/16/gray-glacier-announcement/
> try update erigon version

Whe I upgraded Erigon to the  2022.06.6-alpha-77240899, I got this error:

> try:
> 
> ```
> make integration
> ./build/bin/integration state_stages --unwind=10 --datadir=<your_datadir>
> ./build/bin/integration stage_headers --unwind=10 --datadir=<your_datadir>
> ```

After the execution is completed, there is a new error report


`Jul 04 05:42:48 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[12079]: [EROR] [07-04|05:42:48.009] Staged Sync                              err="must not happen, ResetSequence: 1122983, lastInDB: 1652931666, trace: [stageloop.go:116 panic.go:844 accessors_chain.go:841 stage_bodies.go:284 default_stages.go:62 sync.go:359 sync.go:203 stageloop.go:150 stageloop.go:53 asm_amd64.s:1571]"

I solve this issue by this command:
` ./build/bin/integration  stage_headers --reset --datadir=/home/eth/.local/share/erigon
`
